entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this morning. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
